name: Droobico: The Legend Begins
description:
One day boy comes home to find a keek in bed. keek takes boy body, and boy becomes keek. boy must travel through frace and fight the emily! take the body back! steny sidequest! oww

Exciting gameplay, hour of content, and sten delight awaits the boy brave enough to take on Wilko. Explore france, Explore macron, Explore school, Explore a poop, and join the family on an exciting.
